Hi Rawad,

 

I hope you're well!

 

Looping in @Alienor Balland <mailto:Alienor.Balland@me.zimmermann.com>  & @Pamela Sapitan <mailto:Pamela.Sapitan@me.zimmermann.com>  for visibility.

 

Rawad, could you please assist with the following for the new offsite location at Mall of the Emirates:

 

*	Arrange for CCTV installation and connection to the control room.
*	Share the installation and ongoing costs for the CCTV installation and clarify where these will be billed to? 
*	Please advise on the fire extinguishers: There are currently two on-site.

m>; 'Philip Abdou' <Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com>; 'Joe Hobeika' <Joe.Hobeika@chalhoub.com>; 'Samer Kaidbey' <Samer.Kaidbey@chalhoub.com>
Subject: RE: Zimmermann Dubai MOE Offsite Storage Room Security

 

Dear Rawad,

 

I hope you have been keeping well.

 

Please note the lease is almost finalised for the relocation of our Dubai MOE offsite storage room.

 

In regards to the below queries we have some responses from the leasing team in green:

 

*	CCTV system to be installed specifically to cover the door (entry and exit point) and general view. The CCTV should be connected to our group control room. No issue with this from Zimmermann side. Awaiting approval from the Leasing team.
*	The keys of the stock room will be kept in the store safe when not in use. Well noted.
*	shelves to be secured and anchored into the wall , to avoid shelve collapse and instability. Leasing team have confirmed this is approved. 
*	shelves should not reach the fire sprinkler level, at least 50 cm to be kept as a distance between the stock/ shelve and the fire sprinkler. Leasing team has requested 75cm clearance from sprinkler so we will confirm our system suits with storage supplier.
*	all shelves to be perforated to allow water to go through in case of fire. Well noted this has been requested from supplier.
*	I need more information about the accessories, value ? we might need a safe if the amount is big.  No jewellery will be held here only RTW, Bags, Shoes and Lycra in terms of product. What value is in the high range and would require a safe? 
*	At least two fire extinguishers to be available (COS and Dry Powder) near to the door.

eika@chalhoub.com <mailto:Joe.Hobeika@chalhoub.com> >; Samer Kaidbey <Samer.Kaidbey@chalhoub.com <mailto:Samer.Kaidbey@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: RE: Zimmermann Dubai MOE Offsite Storage Room Security

 

Hello Cloey,

 

I’m very well, thank you for asking and I hope you are doing well too. 

 

About the external storage, the following measures to be confirmed. 

 

*	CCTV system to be installed specifically to cover the door (entry and exit point) and general view. The CCTV should be connected to our group control room.
*	The keys of the stock room will be kept in the store safe when not in use.
*	shelves to be secured and anchored into the wall , to avoid shelve collapse and instability. 
*	shelves should not reach the fire sprinkler level, at least 50 cm to be kept as a distance between the stock/ shelve and the fire sprinkler. 
*	all shelves to be perforated to allow water to go through in case of fire. 
*	I need more information about the accessories, value ? we might need a safe if the amount is big.  
*	At least two fire extinguishers to be available (COS and Dry Powder) near to the door.
*	Smoke detector is mandatory.
*	Adding this storage to your annual maintenance contract 

 

Adding @Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>  from the insurance team to help where needed.

 

And  @Hasna Raissi <mailto:Hasna.Raissi@chalhoub.com>  into this email for her visibility and support where needed. 

 

Regards 

Rawad 

 

 

RAWAD HOSSEIN​​​​

DIRECTOR ‑ HSSE

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

Reaching out today as we are in leasing negotiations to move our offsite storage room in Dubai MOE to a more secure space. 

 

We are keen to understand what the security requirements are to allow us to hold our excess stock (garments, accessories and excess retail packaging) in this storage room. 

 

Please see the floorplan and site images attached noting Balenciaga had used the room previously. 

 

Looking forward to hearing back with your advice. 

 

Many thanks,

Cloey 

 

Cloey Tenorio 
Retail Stores Opening Manager- EU,UK & ME

Subject: RE: Zimmermann Dubai MOE Offsite Storage Room Security

 

Dear Rawad,

 

I hope you have been keeping well.

 

Please note the lease is almost finalised for the relocation of our Dubai MOE offsite storage room.

 

In regards to the below queries we have some responses from the leasing team in green:

 

*	CCTV system to be installed specifically to cover the door (entry and exit point) and general view. The CCTV should be connected to our group control room. No issue with this from Zimmermann side. Awaiting approval from the Leasing team.
*	The keys of the stock room will be kept in the store safe when not in use. Well noted.
*	shelves to be secured and anchored into the wall , to avoid shelve collapse and instability. Leasing team have confirmed this is approved. 
*	shelves should not reach the fire sprinkler level, at least 50 cm to be kept as a distance between the stock/ shelve and the fire sprinkler. Leasing team has requested 75cm clearance from sprinkler so we will confirm our system suits with storage supplier.
*	all shelves to be perforated to allow water to go through in case of fire. Well noted this has been requested from supplier.
*	I need more information about the accessories, value ? we might need a safe if the amount is big.  No jewellery will be held here only RTW, Bags, Shoes and Lycra in terms of product. What value is in the high range and would require a safe? 
*	At least two fire extinguishers to be available (COS and Dry Powder) near to the door.

eika@chalhoub.com <mailto:Joe.Hobeika@chalhoub.com> >; Samer Kaidbey <Samer.Kaidbey@chalhoub.com <mailto:Samer.Kaidbey@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: RE: Zimmermann Dubai MOE Offsite Storage Room Security

 

Hello Cloey,

 

I’m very well, thank you for asking and I hope you are doing well too. 

 

About the external storage, the following measures to be confirmed. 

 

*	CCTV system to be installed specifically to cover the door (entry and exit point) and general view. The CCTV should be connected to our group control room.
*	The keys of the stock room will be kept in the store safe when not in use.
*	shelves to be secured and anchored into the wall , to avoid shelve collapse and instability. 
*	shelves should not reach the fire sprinkler level, at least 50 cm to be kept as a distance between the stock/ shelve and the fire sprinkler. 
*	all shelves to be perforated to allow water to go through in case of fire. 
*	I need more information about the accessories, value ? we might need a safe if the amount is big.  
*	At least two fire extinguishers to be available (COS and Dry Powder) near to the door.
*	Smoke detector is mandatory.
*	Adding this storage to your annual maintenance contract 

 

Adding @Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>  from the insurance team to help where needed.

 

And  @Hasna Raissi <mailto:Hasna.Raissi@chalhoub.com>  into this email for her visibility and support where needed. 

 

Regards 

Rawad 

 

 

RAWAD HOSSEIN​​​​

DIRECTOR ‑ HSSE

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

Reaching out today as we are in leasing negotiations to move our offsite storage room in Dubai MOE to a more secure space. 

 

We are keen to understand what the security requirements are to allow us to hold our excess stock (garments, accessories and excess retail packaging) in this storage room. 

 

Please see the floorplan and site images attached noting Balenciaga had used the room previously. 

 

Looking forward to hearing back with your advice. 

 

Many thanks,

Cloey

ka@chalhoub.com <mailto:Joe.Hobeika@chalhoub.com> >; 'Samer Kaidbey' <Samer.Kaidbey@chalhoub.com <mailto:Samer.Kaidbey@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: RE: Zimmermann Dubai MOE Offsite Storage Room Security

 

Dear Rawad,

 

I hope you have been keeping well.

 

Please note the lease is almost finalised for the relocation of our Dubai MOE offsite storage room.

 

In regards to the below queries we have some responses from the leasing team in green:

 

*	CCTV system to be installed specifically to cover the door (entry and exit point) and general view. The CCTV should be connected to our group control room. No issue with this from Zimmermann side. Awaiting approval from the Leasing team.
*	The keys of the stock room will be kept in the store safe when not in use. Well noted.
*	shelves to be secured and anchored into the wall , to avoid shelve collapse and instability. Leasing team have confirmed this is approved. 
*	shelves should not reach the fire sprinkler level, at least 50 cm to be kept as a distance between the stock/ shelve and the fire sprinkler. Leasing team has requested 75cm clearance from sprinkler so we will confirm our system suits with storage supplier.
*	all shelves to be perforated to allow water to go through in case of fire. Well noted this has been requested from supplier.
*	I need more information about the accessories, value ? we might need a safe if the amount is big.  No jewellery will be held here only RTW, Bags, Shoes and Lycra in terms of product. What value is in the high range and would require a safe? 
*	At least two fire extinguishers to be available (COS and Dry Powder) near to the door.

Hello Cloey,

 

I’m very well, thank you for asking and I hope you are doing well too. 

 

About the external storage, the following measures to be confirmed. 

 

*	CCTV system to be installed specifically to cover the door (entry and exit point) and general view. The CCTV should be connected to our group control room.
*	The keys of the stock room will be kept in the store safe when not in use.
*	shelves to be secured and anchored into the wall , to avoid shelve collapse and instability. 
*	shelves should not reach the fire sprinkler level, at least 50 cm to be kept as a distance between the stock/ shelve and the fire sprinkler. 
*	all shelves to be perforated to allow water to go through in case of fire. 
*	I need more information about the accessories, value ? we might need a safe if the amount is big.  
*	At least two fire extinguishers to be available (COS and Dry Powder) near to the door.
*	Smoke detector is mandatory.
*	Adding this storage to your annual maintenance contract 

 

Adding @Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>  from the insurance team to help where needed.

 

And  @Hasna Raissi <mailto:Hasna.Raissi@chalhoub.com>  into this email for her visibility and support where needed. 

 

Regards 

Rawad 

 

 

RAWAD HOSSEIN​​​​

DIRECTOR ‑ HSSE

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

Reaching out today as we are in leasing negotiations to move our offsite storage room in Dubai MOE to a more secure space. 

 

We are keen to understand what the security requirements are to allow us to hold our excess stock (garments, accessories and excess retail packaging) in this storage room. 

 

Please see the floorplan and site images attached noting Balenciaga had used the room previously. 

 

Looking forward to hearing back with your advice. 

 

Many thanks,

Cloey
